text: This is my test project with react-360, it is in early stage, but i done many features and test many options.

Page created with gatsby as static webpage. For this page i created also backend in node.js, and another admin page for adding and editing events. Events are saving in mongodb. Admin page is secured with nginx HTTP Basic Authentication

Technically this page was created in the same way as gradepro.org. Using Gatsby, and the same backend and admin-page. Additional on guidelines subpage is possible to add record, which can be accepted on admin page. At the bottom on the main page there is tweets section, tweets are collecting by backend in time interval and saved in mongodb.
Another website created with gatsby, this one is the simplest, created quickly directly for conference.
This website! When you reading this i propably thinking how to improve it. Check page and back code on my github.
